name: Secrets of Locks & Keys
description:
Secrets of Keys & Locks

A game where you let your curiosity take over. Explore drawers and rooms to discover clues to unlock the next room. 

This game was made during the Lost Relic Game Jam where the theme for the jam was Connection. So the idea for the game is to have multiple rooms that are connected with each other. Like they have all clues to unlock the next room.

Papes in the game might be dumb but press escape till it dissapears.

This game is still a work in progress. 

Controls

Movement - W, A, S & D

Interact - E

Exit or Pause - Escape

Credits Graphics

Thanks to Kenney for their amazing graphics! View more assets and games from Kenney at https://kenney.itch.io/ or www.kenney.nl 

Also a special thanks to Kostur for letting me use his amazing art for apartment 102.

Programming and Gameplay 

Is made by me, ZultooX.
